name: Thump Trump!
description: With him or against him Thump Trump is the therapeutic way to vent your frustrations by using your fingers to poke at his likeness and score points during a fun 2 minute round. But don't think he will go down without a fight! You score by thumping him and he scores if he comes forward far enough to thump you. Perfect to have in your hand during the RNC, debates, rally's and press conferences!
